Package com.samsung.openscp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScpCertificate
    Interface for SCP certificates usage in SCP11 v1.4
    ScpKeyParams
    SCP key parameters for performing an SCP authentication with a smart card.
    SmartCardConnection
    A connection capable of sending APDUs and receiving their responses.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Apdu
    Data model for encapsulating an APDU command, as defined by ISO/IEC 7816-4 standard.
    GlobalPlatformScpCertificate
    GlobalPlatform certificate for usage in SCP11 v1.4
    KeyRef
    Reference to an SCP key.
    PrivateKeyValues
    Contains private key values to be imported into a smart card.
    PublicKeyValues
    Values defining a public key, such as an RSA or EC key.
    PublicKeyValues.Ec
    Public key values for an elliptic curve key
    Scp03KeyParams
    SCP key parameters for performing an SCP03 authentication.
    Scp11KeyParams
    SCP key parameters for performing SCP11 authentication.
    SecurityDomainSession
    Off-card entity communication (OCE) session with the security domain (SD, smart card)
    SessionKeys
    Session keys for SCP.
    StaticKeys
    SCP03 static AES keys
    X509ScpCertificate
    x509 certificate for usage in SCP11 v1.4
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AesAlg
    AES algorithm, which defines AES session keys size
    ScpMode
    SCP mode, which defines size of challenges, cryptograms and MACs
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ApduException
    Thrown when an APDU command fails with an error code.
    ApplicationNotAvailableException
    The application is either disabled or not supported on the connected smart card
    BadResponseException
    The data contained in a smart card response was invalid.
    CommandException
    An error response from a smart card
